function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Walking or running in a synthetic environment may convey fewer health benefits compared to a natural environment, potentially impacting public health.","Impact":"Reduced physical and mental health benefits for individuals who engage in physical activity in synthetic environments.","Mitigation":"Promote and encourage access to natural environments for physical activity, and provide education on the benefits of green exercise.","Technologies":"Urban planning and design that prioritizes greenspace and natural environments in built environments.","People":"Individuals who engage in physical activity in synthetic environments.","Owner":"Urban planners, public health authorities, and environmental activists."},{"Description":"Lack of knowledge about the mechanisms underlying the relationship between greenspace and health may limit the ability to optimize health benefits from natural environments.","Impact":"Missed opportunities to maximize the health benefits of greenspace and natural areas.","Mitigation":"Invest in research to better understand the mechanisms linking greenspace and health, and integrate the findings into urban planning and public health policies.","Technologies":"Research funding for interdisciplinary studies, data analytics, and urban design tools that consider health impacts.","People":"Researchers, urban planners, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and urban planning organizations."},{"Description":"Undervaluation of greenspace as a resource for health may lead to underinvestment and underutilization of natural environments for promoting public health.","Impact":"Reduced access to green exercise and the associated health benefits, and limited integration of greenspace into public health initiatives.","Mitigation":"Advocate for the importance of greenspace in urban planning and public health, and develop policies that prioritize greenspace for health promotion.","Technologies":"Social advocacy, policy development and implementation, and community engagement strategies.","People":"Communities, public health organizations, and local government entities.","Owner":"Community leaders, public health advocates, and policymakers."}]}
